title: Twitch Rewards
short: Get rewards by gifting subs to Trisp on twitch
news: If you gift subs to Trisp on his twitch channel you will be eligible to earn rewards in the form of physical cards that will be delivered to you and you wil own. There are different types of cards you can get based on the amount of subs you have gifted in the current month, each month coming with new cards that you can get. To get the cards you must pass one of the goals, those being 5 gifted subs, 10 gifted subs, 25 gifted subs, 50 gifted subs and 100 gifted subs (check the foot note for a link to see what the rewards can be).
